title: Fix transaction card communication counters
variance: Text and email thread counters on TransactionCard show wrong counts. Counters hidden until fixed. Need to recalculate counts based on new junction table architecture.

title: Support HEIC image attachments in text threads
variance: HEIC images from iPhone don't display in text thread preview. Need to convert to displayable format or show placeholder.

title: Auto-trigger email sync on contact list changes
variance: When contacts are added/modified on a transaction, automatically trigger email sync instead of requiring manual 'Sync Communications' click.

title: Fix unknown contact name display in text threads
variance: When linking text threads to transactions, some 1:1 conversations display 'unknown' as contact name instead of actual contact. Contact lookup not finding phone number match.

title: Fix thread deduplication during message import
variance: Same conversation appears as multiple separate threads in UI. Messages from same thread imported with different thread_ids or grouping logic not consolidating properly.

title: User Identifiers Table for Contact Resolution
variance: Create user_identifiers table to store user email/phone identifiers. Improves contact resolution performance (indexed lookup vs O(n) message scan). Supports multiple emails/phones, future messaging platforms. Auto-populate from OAuth and message imports. SR Engineer approved architecture.

Add attachments progress phase to sync status indicator

title: Settings Messages Import needs SyncOrchestrator queue awareness
est_tokens: MacOSMessagesImportSettings should detect when messages is queued (pending) in the orchestrator queue and show appropriate UI feedback. Currently only shows state when messages is actively running or user-initiated.

title: OS notifications for sync completion
est_tokens: Show native OS notifications when background syncs complete (contacts, emails, messages, iPhone wired sync). Helps users know when data is ready, especially for long-running syncs like iPhone backup import on Windows. Should cover: auto-login sync, manual refresh, wired iPhone sync on PC.

title: Add manual Check for Updates button
Error Logging Service + Supabase Dashboard
variance: CRITICAL: Add error logging to Supabase for production monitoring. Components: 1) error_logs table (DONE) 2) errorLoggingService that captures errors globally + breadcrumb tracking 3) User feedback prompt submitted with logs 4) Broker Portal dashboard. Captures: device info OS/memory/disk auth state db state sync status navigation history.

title: Enhanced ErrorScreen with Reset and User Feedback
variance: CRITICAL: Extend ErrorScreen. Add: 1) Retry button 2) User feedback textarea 3) Submit logs to Supabase 4) RESET APP DATA button - clears local storage + keychain then restarts fresh 5) Confirmation dialog 6) Self-healing for corrupted state. Split into TASK-1800 (logging) and TASK-1802 (reset). Depends on BACKLOG-612.

title: Fix onboarding race condition - needsTermsAcceptance default
variance: Fix: Change needsTermsAcceptance default from true to false in electron/main.ts. Returning users with terms already accepted in Supabase shouldnt see terms screen again.

title: Graceful skip for syncs when no local user exists
variance: Fix: SyncOrchestrator and handlers should gracefully skip (return empty) when getValidUserId returns null instead of erroring. Prevents No valid user found crashes during deferred DB init. PR #737 merged.

title: Bulk Edit Role Feature for User Management
variance: Add bulk role editing: BulkEditRoleModal component, UserTableRow with selection, bulkUpdateRole server action, UserActionsDropdown Edit Role option.
